channel.title: Help please i need to know to make my server
channel.description:
file://localhost/C:/Documents%20and%20Settings/michael.YOUR-KYBTG65GXE/My%20Documents/My%20Pictures/picture%20of%20silab%20thing.avi
WHAT DOES THIS MEAN? PLEASE HELP ME![br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 17, 2008, 06:33:13 PM[/size][hr]SORRY CAME OUT WRONG. BUT WHEN I RUN THE SERVER, IT SAYS:
'java' is not reconized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. press any key to continue...
WHAT DO I DO TO FIX THIS?

item.title: Help please i need to know to make my server
item.dc:creator: @Erj Erj
item.description:
@Erj wrote:

^^ Where did you come from? xD

Anyways all you have to do is google Apache ant, JDK, and wamp. Their should be some sites that could help you. Oh and then when you have all the programs needed for your server, look at post #2 And if your running a MoonSpell server you dont really need wamp… At all… Unless your running like Demonik, RSCD, or some other shitty source, then thats where wamp comes in.

Btw, try searching the board for some tutorials on how to start your server. I’m sure there are a few around here. Hope this help, if it didnt then dont bother…

Read full topic

item.title: Help please i need to know to make my server
item.dc:creator: @elyad elyad
item.description:
@elyad wrote:

You need to install wamp,jdk & apache ant. Then edit your paths in run.bat, right click edit.

e.g

set PATH=%PATH%;C:\apache-ant-1.7.0\bin set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program\Java\jdk1.6.0_04 ant demonikf2p

Read full topic
